ygData.subject: Prime gets up
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He stood up, ready to see his old friends . Welcome, Rodimus, He said, Welcome..Hydra. I see that things have changed in my absence. But, no more

::Optimus Prime:

     He stood up, ready to see his old "friends".
     "Welcome, Rodimus," He said, "Welcome..Hydra. I see that things 
have changed in my absence. But, no more worries, things will be put 
to rights.
     "Which is what I have come here to discuss, All these pathetic, 
weak factions. Where are the Autobots and Decepticons of old? From 
what I have learned in the data disks, that I stole, there are many 
smaller factions here. The NWO? The Tripreds, even the Maximals and 
Predacons; what are all these things?
     "You two are the leaders of some prominent groups, Rodimus, you 
act as though I taught you nothing," He walked over to him, and 
placed his hand on his shoulder, as he had left his gun on a ripped 
apart stump. Secretly he had placed a bug on his shoulder, very tiny, 
about the size of a freckle. "Why haven't you crushed those that seek 
to rip your faction apart?"
     He let go and walked to Hydra, "And you, although part of you 
may have killed me long ago, you have fallen from your vaunted seat. 
You have had to merge with the new Megatron. Galvatron not enough for 
you?"
     Prime held Hydra's upper arm, and placed a bug on it.
     Then he turned and walked away, back to where he had begun. "I 
have crossed galaxies to put things to right here," He bent down to 
grab his gun, which he promptly attached to his leg.
     "You are both free to go," He said, then smiled at Rodimus, "Oh 
yes, one last thing...You both remember Magnus, right? Well, he gave 
his life to bring me back, and look at how well his wish was granted!"
     He transformed into his truck mode and lifted off, flying right 
over Rodimus's and Hydra's head.

(OOC: The bugs are simple tracers, they won't do much more than 
say "Hey! Rodimus/Hydra is here!" Detected easily enough, with the 
right equipment, which most bases would have. Removal is easy too.)
